trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may terminate the instance because of an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Un'istanza del flusso di lavoro può essere terminata in tre modi: l'host può chiamare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>attività può essere richiamata dall'interno dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro o il motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro può terminare l'istanza a causa di un'eccezione non gestita.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata, il motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro genera il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: L'host può sottoscrivere questo evento aggiungendo un gestore eventi per <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'eccezione che ha causato la chiusura dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, Exception contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminato a causa di un'eccezione non gestita, l'eccezione contiene l'eccezione non gestita.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, Exception contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata da una chiamata dell'host per <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o da un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>eccezione di attività, contiene un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>con relativo <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>proprietà è impostata su una descrizione del motivo della chiusura.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'host termina l'istanza del flusso di lavoro, fornisce questa descrizione nel `string` parametro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata da un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>la descrizione è fornita da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although in the case of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event that is not due to an unhandled exception, the workflow runtime engine encapsulates a description of the reason for the termination in the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>, it does not necessarily throw this exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sebbene nel caso di un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>evento non è presente a causa di un'eccezione non gestita, il motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro incapsuli una descrizione del motivo della chiusura nella <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>, non genera necessariamente questa eccezione.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Exception>che ha causato la chiusura dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Exception>
